item.title: Python and SAP
item.description:
Description

Montreal, Nov. 26, 2012 - Alvaro Tejada Galindo explains what developpers can do now that external connections are available to both SAP ERP and SAP HANA database.

Useful links:

  • SAP Developer Center: http://developers.sap.com
  • MP33: http://montrealpython.org/2012/11/mp33/
  • Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
  • Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
item.dc:creator: Alvaro Tejada Galindo
